Title: Requires additional investigation of certain claims of abuse or maltreatment
Summary: Requires additional investigation when three or more claims of abuse or maltreatment of a child are made relating to the same person; requires such person to be investigated and evaluated at least once a year for the next five years from the date of the last report.
LawCode: Amd ยง424, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring additional investigation of certain claims of abuse or maltreatment
